summary: This function applies a transformation to the elements in an iterable.
returns: Return an immutable list containing the results of the transformations.
throws: in order to propagate exceptions thrown from within the functor.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    # Create a list of prime numbers.%0A    val primes = [2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17, 19];%0A%0A    # Create a transform that squares its input.%0A    lambda f : Function1 => ($1 is Integer) * ($1 is Integer);%0A%0A    # Apply the transform to the primes. %0A    val squared = F::map(f, primes);%0A%0A    # Print the result.%0A    F::println(squared);%0A}
